INSERT INTO goods( goods_num, goods_sum, goods_rate, goods_object, borrower_id ) VALUES( goods_sequence.nextval, #{goodsVO.goods_sum}, #{goodsVO.goods_rate} , #{goodsVO.goods_object}, #{borrower_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM borrower, goods WHERE borrower.borrower_id = goods.borrower_id and borrower.borrower_registerdate = goods.goods_date and borrower.borrower_status != '서류미제출'
SELECT * FROM borrower, goods WHERE borrower.borrower_id = goods.borrower_id and borrower.borrower_registerdate = goods.goods_date and borrower.borrower_id = #{borrower_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE borrower SET borrower_balance = borrower_balance - (SELECT moneyinout_money FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, moneyinout_date, moneyinout_holder_id, moneyinout_other_id, moneyinout_money, moneyinout_state FROM moneyinout WHERE moneyinout_holder_id = 'muchmore' AND moneyinout_other_id = #{borrower_id} ORDER BY moneyinout_date DESC) WHERE rnum = 1) WHERE borrower_id = #{borrower_id} AND borrower_registerdate = #{borrower_registerdate}
mapper.select: SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) FROM borrower WHERE borrower_id = #{borrower_id} and borrower_status != '상환완료'
mapper.update: UPDATE borrower SET borrower_payok = #{borrower_payok}, borrower_status = #{borrower_status}, borrower_startdate = sysdate, borrower_enddate = add_months(sysdate, #{borrower_loanperiod}) WHERE borrower_id = #{borrower_id} and borrower_registerdate = #{borrower_registerdate}
mapper.select: SELECT nvl(count(*), 0) FROM borrower WHERE borrower_id = #{borrower_id} AND borrower_status = '상환완료'
